title: "EDA"
output: github_document
date: "2025-10-02"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)

weather_df = 
  weather_df |>
  mutate(
    month = lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month"))

```

make plots
```{r}
weather_df |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = prcp)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

check on extreme values
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  filter(prcp>1000)
```

look at data again
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  filter(tmax>=20, tmax <=30) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=tmin, y=tmax, color=name, shape = name))+
  geom_point()
```
## add groups
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  group_by(month)
```
Group and count things
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  group_by(name) |> 
  summarize(
    n=n()
  )
```

```{r}
weather_df |> 
  group_by(month) |> 
  summarize(
    n=n()
  )
```

```{r}
weather_df |> 
  group_by(month, name) |> 
  summarize(
    n=n()
  )
```
```{r}

weather_df |> 
  group_by(month) |> 
  summarize(
    n=n_distinct(date)
  )
```
You can count directly
```{r}
weather_df |> 
  count(name)
```
